settings.html: The Dell Precision 3680 Tower Workstation is engineered to deliver exceptional performance, making it an ideal choice for radiologists and healthcare professionals who require reliable and powerful computing for medical imaging and diagnostic tasks. This workstation offers options with Intel Core i7 or Core i9 processors, combined with advanced graphics and ample memory, ensuring it meets the demanding needs of modern medical environments.

settings.title: Unmatched Processing Power
settings.content: The Dell Precision 3680 offers options with high-performance Intel Core i9 or Core i7 processors, both designed to handle complex medical imaging tasks such as 3D reconstructions, image processing, and large data set analysis. With advanced architecture, these CPUs ensure efficient multitasking and swift data processing, reducing latency and enhancing workflow efficiency. For radiologists, this translates to faster image rendering, quicker access to patient records, and the ability to run multiple diagnostic applications simultaneously without lag, ultimately improving overall patient care and diagnostic accuracy.

settings.title: Unmatched Processing Power
settings.description: The Dell Precision 3680 offers options with high-performance Intel Core i9 or Core i7 processors, both designed to handle complex medical imaging tasks such as 3D reconstructions, image processing, and large data set analysis. With advanced architecture, these CPUs ensure efficient multitasking and swift data processing, reducing latency and enhancing workflow efficiency. For radiologists, this translates to faster image rendering, quicker access to patient records, and the ability to run multiple diagnostic applications simultaneously without lag, ultimately improving overall patient care and diagnostic accuracy.

settings.title: Advanced Graphics Capability
settings.description: Enhance your visual experience with exceptional clarity and superior graphics performance with the Dell Precision 3680 Tower Desktop Workstation. Choose between NVIDIA Quadro, AMD Radeon Pro, or Barco MXRT GPUs, with configurations supporting multiple displays and GPUs. Ideal for analyzing detailed medical images and conducting critical diagnostic tasks, the Dell Precision 3680 ensures unmatched precision for radiologists and medical imaging professionals. This multi-GPU capability boosts your ability to handle high-resolution medical images and complex datasets, equipping you with the necessary tools for accurate diagnosis and research in radiology.

settings.title: High-Velocity DDR5 Memory
settings.description: Provides support for up to 128GB of DDR5 memory, the Dell Precision 3680 offers rapid data access and seamless multitasking. This high-speed memory is essential for managing large imaging files and running multiple applications simultaneously, ensuring that radiologists and PACS administrators can work efficiently without interruption. For medical imaging, this means faster loading times for images, smoother operation of imaging software, and the ability to handle large volumes of data effortlessly.

settings.title: High-Performance Processors
settings.content:
These processors ensure that the Dell Precision 3680 delivers the performance radiologists need for precise and efficient medical imaging:

Dell Precision 3680 with Core i7-13700:

Architecture: 13th generation "Raptor Lake" with 16 cores and 24 threads, ideal for multi-threaded tasks.
Clock Speed: Base 2.1 GHz, boost up to 5.1 GHz for rapid image processing.
Cache: 30 MB L3 and 11.5 MB L2 for quick data access, enhancing imaging software performance.

Dell Precision 3680 with Core i7-14700:

Architecture: 14th generation "Raptor Lake" with 20 cores and 28 threads, excellent for high-volume data management.
Clock Speed: Base 2.3 GHz, boost up to 5.2 GHz for high-speed rendering and diagnostics.
Cache: 33 MB L3 and 12 MB L2 for fast data retrieval during intensive procedures.

Dell Precision 3680 with Core i9-13900:
Architecture: 13th generation "Raptor Lake" with 24 cores and 32 threads, perfect for 3D reconstruction and complex algorithms.
Clock Speed: Base 3.0 GHz, boost up to 5.4 GHz for exceptional processing speed.
Cache: 36 MB L3 and 14 MB L2 for handling high-resolution images and advanced software efficiently.

Dell Precision 3680 with Core i9-14900:

Architecture: 14th generation "Raptor Lake" with 24 cores and 32 threads, for maximum performance.
Clock Speed: Base 3.6 GHz, boost up to 5.8 GHz for rapid and accurate diagnostics.
Cache: 36 MB L3 and 12 MB L2 for managing extensive datasets and running advanced diagnostics smoothly.

settings.title: Advanced Graphics Capability
settings.content: Enhance your visual experience with exceptional clarity and superior graphics performance with the Dell Precision 3680 Tower Desktop Workstation. Choose between NVIDIA Quadro, AMD Radeon Pro, or Barco MXRT GPUs, with configurations supporting multiple displays and GPUs. Ideal for analyzing detailed medical images and conducting critical diagnostic tasks, the Dell Precision 3680 ensures unmatched precision for radiologists and medical imaging professionals. This multi-GPU capability boosts your ability to handle high-resolution medical images and complex datasets, equipping you with the necessary tools for accurate diagnosis and research in radiology.

settings.title: Extreme Scalability in a Mini-Tower Design
settings.description:
Lockable, removable front storage

  • The Dell Precision 3680 is designed for maximum scalability within a compact mini-tower form factor. Featuring lockable, removable front storage, this workstation ensures your data is both secure and easily accessible, meeting the rigorous demands of professional environments.


High-Speed Networking

  • Experience unparalleled network performance with built-in 1GbE Ethernet, providing fast upload, download, and streaming capabilities. For those requiring even greater speeds, the Precision 3680 offers an optional upgrade to 2.5GbE Ethernet. Additionally, M.2 Wi-Fi 6E wireless connectivity ensures you stay connected with the latest wireless standards, offering enhanced speed, capacity, and reduced latency for a seamless networking experience.


Built-in Upgradeability

  • Easily expand storage with included brackets and cables for installing additional SATA HDDs, even after purchase. This flexibility allows you to expand your storage as your data needs grow, ensuring that your system can adapt to evolving requirements without hassle.


Cool and Quiet Performance

  • The new Premium Air Cooler & Air Shroud create a cool air chamber over the CPU, effectively managing thermals and maintaining quiet operation, even under heavy load.

settings.title: High-Performance Processors
settings.description:

  • Architecture: 13th generation "Raptor Lake" with 16 cores and 24 threads, ideal for multi-threaded tasks.
  • Clock Speed: Base 2.1 GHz, boost up to 5.1 GHz for rapid image processing.
  • Cache: 30 MB L3 and 11.5 MB L2 for quick data access, enhancing imaging software performance.

  • Clock Speed: Base 3.6 GHz, boost up to 5.8 GHz for rapid and accurate diagnostics.
  • Cache: 36 MB L3 and 12 MB L2 for managing extensive datasets and running advanced diagnostics smoothly.

settings.title: AI ready workstation
settings.description: Intelligently designed to support your latest AI initiatives, with scalable performance to meet the demanding requirements around training and testing models locally, as part of your AI infrastructure and strategy.

settings.title: Reliability You Can Trust
settings.description: Reliability and sustainability stand as paramount considerations for radiologists, and the Dell 3660 Workstation Tower admirably excels on both fronts. Rigorously MIL-STD tested for reliability, this workstation instills confidence in its robust performance. Further ensuring its prowess, the system boasts ISV certifications for both performance and reliability, attesting to its compatibility with industry standards. The inclusion of ECC memory enhances data integrity, a critical facet in medical imaging tasks where precision is non-negotiable. Going beyond performance, the workstation is also EPEAT registered, a testament to its commitment to sustainability. Through the utilization of eco-friendly materials in its construction, the Dell 3660 Workstation Tower not only meets high-performance demands but also aligns with environmentally conscious practices, making it a conscientious choice for discerning professionals.

settings.title: Experience Enhanced Cooling Efficiency
settings.description: Supporting NVMe Gen. 5 SSD with read speeds up to 14,000 MB/s and write speeds up to 12,000 MB/s, the Dell Precision 3680 offers incredibly fast data transfer rates, reducing load times for large medical datasets and applications. The DDR5 memory ensures smooth multitasking, allowing healthcare professionals to run multiple applications simultaneously without compromising performance.

settings.title: Dell Optimizer
settings.description:
With Dell Optimizer for Precision, this workstation is equipped with intelligent features that adapt to your workflow, optimizing performance and enhancing user experience. Dell Optimizer revolutionizes the PC screen based on user behavior, ensuring a personalized and efficient working environment.

The Dell 3660 Workstation Tower is a powerful and reliable solution designed specifically for radiologists. With its intelligent performance, ample storage options, and advanced connectivity, it provides the ideal platform for efficient and accurate medical imaging tasks.

settings.title: Accelerate business success with Copilot and Windows 11 Pro
settings.description: Industry-Leading AI. Robust Cybersecurity. Tailored for Professional Use. Experience advanced AI and top-tier cybersecurity with Windows 11 Pro on the Dell 3680. Enjoy enhanced multi-tasking capabilities powered by AI, providing a new level of productivity. Features like Copilot in Windows help you obtain more precise answers, advance your skills, and streamline workflows effortlessly. Windows 11 Pro on the Dell 3680 delivers the latest in security and AI advancements directly to your desktop. Benefit from AI-driven efficiency, superior performance, and enhanced security today, while positioning yourself to tackle future challenges with confidence.

settings.title: Ready for Virtual Reality
settings.description: Create fully-immersive AR and VR content with next generation AMD Radeon PRO and NVIDIA RTX™ professional graphics, and powerful performance normally found only in tower workstations.

settings.title: Independent Software Vendor (ISV)
settings.description: Precision workstations are tested to ensure the high-performance applications you rely on every day run smoothly.

settings.description: Intelligently designed to support your latest AI initiatives, with scalable performance to meet the demanding requirements around training and testing models locally, as part of your AI infrastructure and strategy.

settings.title: Dimensions & Weight
settings.description:
The Dell 3680 Workstation Tower features a compact design, measuring efficiently, with dimensions and weight optimized for workspace versatility.

1. Height: 14.68 in. (372.9 mm)

2. Width: 6.81 in. (173 mm)

3. Depth: 16.54 in. (420.2 mm)

Min weight: 16.71 lbs. (7.58 kg)
Max weight: 35.38 lbs. (16.05 kg)

settings.title: Front View Ports & Slots
settings.description:
The Dell 3660 Workstation Tower is equipped with a versatile array of ports, ensuring seamless connectivity for diverse professional needs.

1. 3.5" or 2.5" front-accessible HDD storage option, lockable

2. Optional Optical drive

3. Power button

4. Universal audio port

5. USB 3.2 Gen1 (5Gb/s) Type-A (Lower one with PowerShare) (x2)

6. USB 3.2 Type-C Gen2 (10Gbps) data only - (Lower one with 2x2 (20 Gbps) Type-C® port with PowerShare) (x2)

7. USB 3.2 Type-C Gen 2x2 (20Gbps) data only

8. SD-card slot

settings.title: Rear View Ports & Slots
settings.description:
9. Audio out (3.5mm jack)

10. DP1.4++ HBR2 (x2)

11. USB 3.2 Type-C Gen2 (10Gbps) (lower port has PowerShare)

12. USB 3.2 Type-A Gen2 (10Gbps) (x2)

13. USB 2.0 Type-A (480 Mbps) ports with SmartPower (x2)

14. RJ45 i219 LAN (1GbE) – Optional RJ45 i226 2.5GbE

15. Power connector

16. LED indicator light

17. Lock slot

18. Optional Module – can be one of these (VGA HD15, HDMI 2.0, DP 1.4a HBR3, USB 3.2 Gen2 Type-C w/ DP-Alt mode)

PCle Slots
Full-height Gen5 PCIe x16 slot
Full-height Gen3 PCIe x4 slot
Full-height Gen 4 PCIe x4 slot (open-ended)

settings.title: Exceptional Service & Support from Monitors.com
settings.content:
When you purchase from Monitors.com, you not only receive a top-tier workstation but also benefit from our dedication to value and service. We understand the unique needs of healthcare professionals, and that's why we offer:
Advanced Hot Swap: Our Hot Swap capabilities ensure you can seamlessly switch out components without workflow disruption, guaranteeing uninterrupted productivity.

Next Business Day Standard Replacement: Count on our swift replacement service to keep your workstation running smoothly, minimizing downtime.

Free Shipping & Fast Delivery: We respect your time, offering free shipping and lightning-fast delivery to get you started with your workstation without delay.

Dedicated Support Team: Our team of experts is readily available to address any inquiries or issues, making your journey from purchase to setup as seamless as possible.

Competitive Pricing: At Monitors.com, we're committed to delivering exceptional value. You'll find our products competitively priced to fit comfortably within your budget.

Customer Satisfaction: Your contentment is our top priority, and we're dedicated to ensuring you're thrilled with your purchase. We're here to assist you at every step.

Invest in a Monitors.com workstation for not just top-tier hardware but a partnership committed to your success.

settings.title: Drawing Inspiration from Aston Martin, Crafted for High Performance
